clean_data: Senior Network Engineer Senior span lNetworkspan Engineer Senior Network Engineer Cutting Edge Computers Lapeer MI Work Experience Senior Network Engineer Cutting Edge Computers Pontiac MI 2017 to Present Perform system administration with all aspects of windows server including DHCP DNS DFS and HyperV Executed configurations for routers Layer 2 and Layer 3 switches wireless APs and WLAN controllers using CiscoHP hardware Corrected networking connectivity issues in wireless routing and switching using a layered model approach Monitored the network in order to identify any irregularities in user activity and provide quality documentation including packet capture and analysis Maintained and supported LAN WAN and VoIP infrastructures at all locations via VLANs Created tested and implemented reporting via Powershell which reduced support requests from 20hrs a week to 3hrs a week System Administrator Metro Community Development Flint MI 2015 to 2017 Perform daily system monitoring verifying the integrity and availability of all hardware server resources systems and key processes reviewing system and application logs and verifying completion of scheduled jobs Perform regular security monitoring to identify any possible intrusions Coordinate and communicate with impacted constituencies Provided Tier IIIother support System Administrator US NAVY Lemoore CA 2010 to 2014 Led 24 employees in maintaining the Central Technical Publication Library Maintained and implemented changes to the Naval Maintenance database server Setup and administrated a Local Area Network in support of detachments education Education Bachelor of Science in Computer Science Baker College Flint MI 2017
